title: Kassadin's Joke
body: So after recent nerfs Kassadin lost his silence. His joke states *I tried to silence my mother one... Boy do i regret that.* Now the joke is not funny/doesn't make sense. Thanks Riot you can't even have good jokes anymore.

replies.body: i tried to interrupt my mother's channel once... she didn't have any channels so she didn't seem to notice.

Give him a 0.25 second silence.

There, problem solved.
your right he needs a silence even if its 0.25 seconds like you said.

"I tried to silence my mother once..."

They'll probably do it in the Kass rework. Doesn't make sense to bring in a voice actor for just one line/word.
Give talon a better name for his e as well. They did it for {{champion:7}} so why not talon.

Still got to decide a name.  And his E is a lot harder to rename to something that doesn't sound cheesy than LB's Q.

A mid range blink, that applies a very strong very short duration slow, in the kit of a *literal* assassin of which his primary emphasis is his ludicrous quantity of blades he has, doesn't exactly have a clear name.  If it was a long duration slow, the name Cripple could be used, but it isn't a long duration.  You don't cripple someone for a quarter of a second, you cripple them for life.   It just is hard to have a such a multi-faceted ability have a clear name that accurately describes it.

Actually it makes sense now.

He tried to silence her, he couldn't and now he can't silence carp anymore.
It does make sense because he no longer has his silence. Duh.
He also has a combat quote being "SILENCE!"
